|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3328; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 1.5 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4A4G165WE-BCRC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Motorcomm;YT8521SC; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8153B; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.09;; |stockos = Linux;5.10.60;Friendly Wrt 21.02.1;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C) Female
|serial = yes,, 3-pin,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, RTC, I2C, UART, GPIO, fan header, metal case |addchip = Power Management IC w/ RTC;Rockchip;RK805-1;;1;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;1;,,, 20V 2.4A Single P-Channel MOSFET;Will Semiconductor;WPM2015;;1;,,, 60V 115mA N-Channel MOSFET;Leshan Radio;L2N7002WT1G;;4;,,, PNP/PNP Matched Double Transistor;Nexperia;BCM856BS;;1;,,, Small kVA 3 Phase Isolation Transformer;TEMCo;TT2102;;1;,,, 20V 5A P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO3415A;;3;,,, 4 Channel ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;4;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9193;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = password |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian (unofficial), OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2022 |estprice = 48 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAU62HJ12251 |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "NanoPi R2C Plus" and "2109" is silk-screened on top of board.
{{See also|NanoPi series|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3228 @1.5GHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 1GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *GPIO: 1x 8-pin header *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB (Type-C)
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.friendlyelec.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_R2C_Plus ''NanoPi R2C Plus'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/nanopi-router-board-updated-with-8gb-emmc-and-a-metal-case/ ''NanoPi router board updated with 8GB eMMC and a metal case'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/02/12/nanopi-r2c-plus-dual-gbe-router-board-adds-8gb-emmc-flash/ ''NanoPi R2C Plus dual GbE router board adds 8GB eMMC flash'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/friendlyarm/friendlyarm_nanopi_r2c-plus |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = rockchip |subtarget = armv8 |arch = aarch64_generic |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
